<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Kingmaker Adventure Path](/Sources.aspx?ID=150) pg. 462</row>

**Perception** +30; [lifesense](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=21) 120 feet, [low-light vision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=23)

**Languages**
[Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Sylvan](/Languages.aspx?ID=10); (can't speak any language)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +34, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +31, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +34, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +28, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +34

cold iron 15

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** fly 75 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +33 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [cold iron](/Traits.aspx?ID=27)),
**Damage** 3d8+16 slashing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
wing +33 ([cold iron](/Traits.aspx?ID=27), [reach 10 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=192)),
**Damage** 2d8+16 piercing plus 2d6 [persistent bleed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29)

**Primal Innate Spells** DC 38, attack +30
- **6th**
[Ray of Enfeeblement](/Spells.aspx?ID=244), [True Seeing](/Spells.aspx?ID=344)
- **7th**
[Prismatic Spray](/Spells.aspx?ID=233), [Silence](/Spells.aspx?ID=287), [Teleport](/Spells.aspx?ID=338)
- **8th**
[Darkness](/Spells.aspx?ID=59) (at will), [Dimensional Anchor](/Spells.aspx?ID=70), [Discern Location](/Spells.aspx?ID=75)
- **9th**
[Massacre](/Spells.aspx?ID=186)

**Shadow Doubles** <actions string="Single Action to Three Actions" /> ([Illusion](/Traits.aspx?ID=92), [Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120), [Shadow](/Traits.aspx?ID=143)) **Frequency** once per day; **Effect** For each action spent to use this ability, the ankou creates one shadowy duplicate of themself anywhere within 60 feet of themself. Shadow doubles have the same statistics as an ankou, but they have the [summoned](/Traits.aspx?ID=154) trait, have 110 Hit Points, can't use Shadow Doubles or innate spells, and have an attack bonus of +27 for their Strikes. A shadow double that attempts a saving throw against a light effect can't get a result better than failure. Each double remains for 1 round, until it's reduced to 0 Hit Points, or until it moves further than 120 feet from the ankou, whichever comes first. Each round thereafter, the ankou can spend a single action that has the [concentrate](/Actions.aspx?ID=683) trait to extend the duration of surviving duplicates by 1 round, to a maximum duration of 1 minute. The ankou can see through the eyes of all of the shadow doubles at once. A character who Seeks can identify an ankou as real or a shadow double with a successful DC 43 Perception check.

**[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)**   An ankou assassin's Strikes deal an additional 3d6 precision damage to [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) creatures.

</column>
name: Ankou Assassin
